name: Gun Law
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy. Original version: Richard Clark - Mastertronic. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1987. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta4!

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Original Story:

Four months of bloody alien attacks have taken their toll - all the surviving inhabitants have fled and arson attack have been made on your weapon stores, they destroyed what they could not carry away. You are left alone armed with a single machine gun. You live on your nerves and let your trained instincts take over - prepare to shoot on sight. As you progress through the level of the enemy defenses the alien become more blood-thirsty and turn what were once your own rockets and grenades aganst you. Take cover behind the trees, houses and fences but don't stop for too long or you'll find yourself surrounded. The alien are ruthless and the fighting bloody but you must survive.

Controls on original machine:
Start the game: A
Move: Cursor Keys
Fire: A

Controls in the browser:

Start the game: Z, Alt
Move: Arrow Keys
Fire: Z, Alt

Original game (Commodore 16/Plus4 ) link: http://plus4world.powweb.com/software/Gunlaw
